00005 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00006 #include <stdexcept>
00007 #include <cassert>
00008 #endif
00009 
00018 template <class T>
00019 class SimpleArray_t : public std::vector<T>
00020 {
00021 public:
00022   T &operator[](UInt_t index) 
00023 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00024     throw (std::range_error)
00025 #endif    
00026   {
00027 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00028     if (index>=std::vector<T>::size()) {
00029       *((char *) 0)='a';
00030       throw std::range_error(__ASSERT_FUNCTION);
00031     }
00032 #endif
00033     return std::vector<T>::operator[](index);
00034   };
00035 
00036   const T &operator[](UInt_t index) const
00037 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00038     throw (std::range_error)
00039 #endif    
00040   {
00041 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00042     if (index>=std::vector<T>::size()) {
00043       *((char *) 0)='a';
00044       throw std::range_error(__ASSERT_FUNCTION);
00045     }
00046 #endif
00047     return std::vector<T>::operator[](index);
00048   };
